issue.title: [C++] Implement strftime on date32/64 types
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-13916](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13916). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Python actually supports this too: <https://docs.python.org/3/library/datetime.html#datetime.date.strftime>
